snippet.title: Zelda Revival - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
A Majora's Mask romhack with a small world to explore.
Version 1.1 (updated 12/03/23)
https://www.mediafire.com/file/wfhre3ca6tpshay/Zelda+Revival+1.1.bps/file
I used this to create the patch with Majora's Mask USA: https://www.marcrobledo.com/RomPatcher.js/

If you want to play on WII :
https://www.mediafire.com/file/wfhre3ca6tpshay/Zelda+Revival+1.1.bps/file
it requires using Flips IPS to patch https://www.romhacking.net/utilities/1040/
Patch over   Legend of Zelda- Majora's Mask NTSCU.wad
Thanks to StoneeBadLuck


tools used :
- SharpOcarina
- Zelda64-Text-Editor
- seq64
- zztexview
- SceneTatl 
- HxD
- Sketchup
- Blender
- FL Studio
- Photofiltre

Deku Playground is made by Shoopey
Thanks to all who helped or supported the project
